name: Chapter 10: Fighting Back
short_description: The Enterprise crew and loyal Codarians fight back against the rogue faction. Intense negotiations and strategic maneuvers ensue as they attempt to regain control of the project.
people: Captain Picard, Commander Riker, Data, Worf, loyal Codarians, rogue Codarians
from_prev_chapter: The team devises a contingency plan to work around the sabotage.
to_next_chapter: Regaining control, the team faces new technical challenges and time constraints.
